did.unittitle: Item 1: Resolution Commemorating the 100th Anniversary of the Triangle Shirtwaist Factory Fire

scopecontent.p: Proposed by District 4 Councilman, Jesse Arreguin, to the Mayor and City Council of New York City.

Celebrate the 100th Anniversary of International Women's Day; Learn About Women's Activism in Today's Latin America; BCC Remembers: 100th Anniversary of the Triangle Shirtwaist Fire and Immigrant Women Workers; Take Charge of Your Health
